channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游릭 04:53 Driven anxiety in Sumy Oblast.Creck on further messages.
item.description: 游릭 04:53 Driven anxiety in Sumy Oblast.Creck on further messages.#Sumy_ex This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游리 04:46 Flashing anxiety in the Kharkiv region. Consider, anxiety is still in:- Kupyansky district- Kharkiv district- Lauda territorial community- Vovchansk territorial community

item.title: 游리 04:46 Failure to Dnipropetrovsk Oblast. Present that the alarm is still in:- Sinelnikovsky rayon- Marganets and Marganets Territorial Community- Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community- Chervono-Grigoriva Territorial Community
item.description: 游리 04:46 Failure to Dnipropetrovsk Oblast.
